title: "The sixth Lithuania Bitcoin Meetup event includes a look at artificial intelligence and cryptocurrency regulation"
excerpt: "In his presentation, Mr. Krampas discussed the application of Artificial Intelligence (AI) in blockchains. He stated that this area is far from reaching its peak, with reference to the fact that some have promised that the value of AI projects will grow from USD 142 billion in 2022 to more than USD 420 billion in 2025."
